summary: This module supplies a collection of developmentâ€‘time utilities for inspecting and profiling code execution. It includes context managers and helpers for capturing call stacks, displaying function signatures, and running performance profilers such as Yappi and VizTracer, as well as generic debugging aids.
business_intent: To provide developers working on the DVC platform with tools that simplify performance analysis and troubleshooting, enabling faster identification of bottlenecks and clearer insight into runtime behavior during development and testing.
